title: Creamy French Dressing

preparations.content: Place a jug on mixing bowl lid and weigh in oil. Remove and set aside,

Place egg yolks, mustard, vinegar, cayenne pepper, sugar and salt in mixing bowl then mix <b>1 min/speed 4<b> while slowly pouring reserved oil onto mixing bowl lid, letting it drizzle around measuring cup in a thin stream onto rotating blades to create an emulsion.

Place a jug on mixing bowl lid and weigh in cream. Remove measuring cup and mix <b>15 sec/speed 3<b> while pouring cream through hole in mixing bowl lid. Serve immediately or refrigerate until needed.

hintsAndTricks: This creamy dressing is delicious drizzled over a green salad, or served alongside crudités for dipping.
